thread.title: Charming staff make this small hotel special
thread.title_full: Charming staff make this small hotel special - Review of Hotel Sacha by HappyCulture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: croham
title: Charming staff make this small hotel special
text: Hotel Sacha is a charming, well located hotel, 15 minutes walk from Gare du Nord, so very convenient for those on a weekend break with Eurostar. The staff are welcoming and helpful and the complimentary glass of champagne with nibbles every evening is a lovely touch - as are the sweeties dotted around the hotel. The rooms are tiny so may be difficult if you have a lot of luggage but fine for a weekend break.
